cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and give you light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I shine very brightly.
🔥 I am very hot.
😎 You can't look directly at me.

cosmos.question: I am round and blue and green, and you live here! What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I am your home.
💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 Plants and animals live here.

cosmos.question: I come out at night. Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm a crescent. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I change my shape.
🐺 Werewolves like me.
🧀 Some people think I'm made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am a bright light far, far away, much bigger than Earth! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🌟 I am very hot like the Sun.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me better.

cosmos.question: I am red and dusty, and sometimes people think there are aliens on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People have sent rovers to explore me.
🍫 I'm named after a Roman god of war.
🔴 I'm called the Red Planet.

cosmos.question: I'm a giant ball of gas with a big red spot! What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am the biggest planet in our solar system.
🪐 I have many moons.
🌪️ My red spot is a giant storm.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very shiny.
🪐 I am a very large planet made of gas.
🔭 You need a telescope to see my rings clearly.

cosmos.question: When I fall to Earth, I burn up and make a bright streak in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Some people call me a shooting star.
🌠 I am a small piece of rock or metal.
✨ Make a wish when you see me!

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa I'm sometimes named after animals or people.
🌌 You can find me using a star map.
🐻 The Big Dipper is part of me.
I'm sometimes named after animals or people.
You can find me using a star map.
The Big Dipper is part of me.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust, and our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am shaped like a spiral.
✨ I have billions of stars inside.
🌌 I am called the Milky Way.

animal.question: I say 'Meow', and I like to drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I love to drink this white liquid.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ I'm a furry friend that people keep as a pet.

animal.question: I wag my tail and bark. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on this bone shaped treat.
🎾 I love when you throw this in the park!
🏠 I am often called man's best friend and live in a kennel.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I come from a white or brown smooth object!
🦆 I have a flat beak.
💦 I love to play in water!

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love eating these!
🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I am big and green and hop. I like to eat flies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I can jump very high.
👅 My tongue is long and sticky!
🦟 I like to eat these pesky creatures!

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal.
🌿 I eat mostly plants.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I say 'Neigh' and like to run in the fields. People ride on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I love to eat oats and hay.
🐎 Some people train me to race!
🤠 Cowboys ride on my back!

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a cat, but very large.
👑 I am known as the king!

animal.question: I hop around and have a pouch for my baby. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am from Australia!
🦘 I carry my baby in a safe pocket.
🌿 I eat plants and hop for transportation.

animal.question: I am black and white and eat bamboo. What am I?

hints.text: 🇨🇳 I am from China!
🐼 I am a type of bear with unique coloring.
🌱 My diet consists almost entirely of bamboo.
